Age of Empires scenario file format

Message board

Other file formats used in AoE:

  • .drs files
  • .SLP descriptions by Brian Yip (12 K)
  • basics of RLE sprites

I have also set up a message board so people can share their knowledge about the different file formats.

Scenario files

Whenever an incorrect .scn file is found, the scenario is replaced by a large, clear grass map. So when you change a byte and get such a scenario, you will have to go back and try again :(
The strange thing is that if you save a scenario twice, you will get different files. For instance, this scenario and that one are entirely different files, but they are in fact the same scenario.

Hex dump of a scenario file (map size: tiny) that contains only water and a single fishing boat in the left corner of the diamond: 

00000000 312E 3131 1400 0000 0200 0000 3A42 7435 1.11........:Bt5
The first five bytes look like some version number; the bytes 0C to 0F seem to be a timestamp (you can put arbitrary stuff into it) 
00000010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0200 0000 EC9D BD4E ...............N
00000020 3241 1846 6759 4540 512A 6B12 29AC 4C74 2A.FgYE@Q*k.).Lt
00000030 FD2B 8C10 6CA8 8CF1 0E88 D209 18B5 A1A3 .+..l...........
00000040 F002 484C E8BC 165B 136F C2C2 FBC0 79D9 ..HL...[.o....y.
00000050 19DC 8C3B 44A3 F988 1FE7 E4BC 997D 369B ...;D........}6.
00000060 07C4 CD16 2623 8152 2A8A 1EAA 7A01 0000 ....&#.R*...z...
00000070 0000 0000 80FF 1CF9 3B80 9D05 B30A 1993 ........;.......
00000080 2DA1 93E5 3899 179D 9C75 F292 9373 4ECE -...8....u...sN.
00000090 3BB9 E0E4 6527 AF38 B9E8 E455 27AF 39B9 ;...e'.8...U'.9.
000000A0 64B2 F979 FB4F 05D5 6A5F DFF5 A2AD DB8B d..y.O..j_......
000000B0 CEC7 6539 553E 3AED 765A C7E5 E947 8966 ..e9U>:.vZ...G.f
000000C0 5D99 55E7 CDCE 65B7 3DAB F5AB EF7A 5647 ].U...e.=....zVG
000000D0 B3FE 7C92 BFAD BFC8 E368 3492 F5D9 CCD0 ..|......h4.....
000000E0 9C9F A72C 9F81 7D58 F9B8 D74F ADCD 8DF8 ...,..}X...O....
000000F0 E1C5 30CC 7C0E 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 ..0.|...........
Now the fun starts :)   So far, no one has been able to change a byte there without corrupting the scenario :( 
00000100 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 00C0 5FC1 EE17 ............_...
00000110 F909 C98D 620C C330 F334 BF89 3C8F 1B7A ....b..0.4..<..z
If you change anything below there, the game will hang when trying to load the scenario. 
00000120 9509 0244 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 ...DDDDDDDDDDDDD
00000130 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 4444 DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
00000140 C4DF 313F DED1 DC38 8947 5837 C7FF 324F ..1?...8.GX7..2O
00000150 F668 57E3 E9CB AA8A 2AF3 F632 AC4D DB8A .hW.....*..2.M..
00000160 2D6F 3FAF CEAE 9ABD D64D 795B 8757 7D79 -o?......My[.W}y
00000170 AD56 5115 391F 0461 8C7D 05FB B5C7 6963 .VQ.9..a.}....ic
00000180 5F35 D16D 7A77 7428 D565 6C6F 688A E532 _5.mzwt(.eloh..2
00000190 FB35 C4DF EF8D 3EF7 9A62 DB3B ADDB DFBB .5....>..b.;....
000001A0 9BD2 1B17 277B 7DDD FEDE BDB4 DE71 B1DB ....'{}......q..
000001B0 9BD6 EDEF DD4F ED95 E2B4 5EB7 DBDF 7B90 .....O....^...{.
000001C0 DEAB 8B7D BDC9 6E7F EFA1 0E03 DD3B A837 ...}..n......;.7
000001D0 E47F 004C 7AC3 F14D 3CED 1E8B EF72 A7F7 ...Lz..M<....r..
000001E0 7D00 00
